history.proof: intros (HR1sym,HR1trans) (HR2sym,HR2trans). qsimpl time: 1 use: reflexive,preorder,transitive. split. - intros x; split; reflexivity. - intros x y; unfold symmetric; intros. apply and_comm; auto. sfirstorder depth: 3use: reflexive, preorder, transitive.

original: intros (HR1sym,HR1trans) (HR2sym,HR2trans). unfold preorder, reflexive, transitive, product_preorder. split. - intros x; split; reflexivity. - intros x y; unfold symmetric; intros. apply and_comm; auto. - intros x y z; unfold transitive; intros. destruct H, H0; split. + now apply HR1trans with y. + now apply HR2trans with y.
